content.description: Fun tall V2. Stand start in jugs and traverse left and up through more jugs. Pull up on smaller holds for the last few moves and mantle.
content.protection: You'll want multiple crash pads and a spotter.
content.location: The main climb right in the middle of The Lady Slipper Boulder

content.description: Stand start on the chalked up crimps halfway up the boulder and paste your foot (get set on the wall - jumping from the ground is not part of the problem). Throw up to the crimps straight above and continue to some more hard moves.
content.location: Located on The Lady Slipper boulder to the left of Lady Slipper around the arÃªte.

content.description: Slap up this short, bulgy problem on classic Horse Pens slopers. It's no Bumboy but still fun if you happen to be in the area.
content.location: This problem is located just right of the Lady Slipper boulder on the small rock perpendicular to Lady Slipper. It's the only problem on this rock

content.description: Tall boulder with some good V2's and V3's on the main part and God Module around the corner!!
